titleStmt.title: A paraphrase with notes upon the sixth chapter of St. John with a discourse on humanity and charity / by W. Claget.
titleStmt.author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for J. Robinson and T. Newborough,

notesStmt.note: "A discourse of humanity and charity." p. [71]-98 has special t.p.
"A letter concerning Protestants charity to Papists" p. 99-124.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
